name: The thief, the cop and the cat
name_original: The thief, the cop and the cat
description:
Léon Lenclos
Music: Louis Pezet
Made for the 1-button Jam 2020

Controls

This is a one-button game. You will only need one button. Like the space bar or whatever

The thief jumps when you release the button. She jumps further if you press the button longer.

Same with the cop, but the cop runs when you press the button.

Same with the cat, but he runs when you don't press the button.
